title: Cyber security company selects Huntsville for expansion site, to create 59 high paying jobs
content: The Huntsville City Council approved a project development agreement with Infinity Labs LLC that includes the creation of up to 59 high paying jobs. and filled by Dec. 31, 2028. The jobs will have an average annual salary of $110,000, excluding benefits.The City assistance will be provided as a reimbursement once the jobs have been created
